channel.title: Cancer Research on xiaoni's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cancer Research on xiaoni's blog

item.title: Bioinformatics analysis of prognostic value of PITX1 gene in breast cancer
Comprehensive Bioinformatics Analysis of Tumor-Infiltrating Immune Cells
item.description:
Recent clinical successes of cancer immunotherapy necessitate the investigation of the interaction between malignant cells and the host immune system.

Herein, I summarized five bioinformatics tools for comprehensive analysis of tumor-infiltrating immune cells.

item.title: Identification of Therapeutic Targets and Prognostic Biomarkers Among CXC Chemokines in the Renal Cell Carcinoma Microenvironment
item.description: In this study, the authors conducted an in-depth and comprehensive bioinformatics analysis of the expression of CXC chemokines in RCC and evaluated their potential as therapeutic targets and prognostic biomarkers based on several large public databases.
